turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which peet's did you want to place an order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which peet's did you want to place an order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what did you want order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A iced latte with whole milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want that drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so let me see if i got all the details right. large iced latte with whole milk and whipped cream from Peet's at 805 west main in des moines iowa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be $3.40. would you like to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the drink order has been placed. it'll be ready for pick up at 805 west main in 9 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can help you wit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you. No, that's fine. Thank you.
